comments: Born 12 April, 1932 at Olds, Alberta, Canada.
examples: Lithophragma affine A.Gray subsp. mixtum Roy L.Taylor Univ. Calif. Publ. Bot. 37: 57. 1965. Geum schofieldii Calder & Roy L.Taylor in Canad. Journ. Bot. 43: 1394. 1965
